name: Faulty Tweaks
description:
First game made for the Godot Wild Jam. (Sorry for bugs)

Trapped in a strange place with pipes and boxes, Put them where they belong and reach the required score to be able to leave.

Controls

Up/Down/Left/Right - Movement

Z - Pick/Run

X - Throw

Credits: 

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-cave-loop

Font: https://www.fontspace.com/public-pixel-font-f72305

And a lot of  youtube tutorials.
